body:
Comment 3: 
#1:

- go install is silent because it succeeded. The godoc binary gets installed in
$GOROOT/bin, not $GOPATH/bin. Make sure $GOROOT/bin is in your $PATH.

- The path $GOROOT/src/fmt/print.go seems to be from tip,. In Go 1.3. it should be
$GOROOT/src/pkg/fmt/print.go. Make sure you don't have a mixed setup of tip and release.
